fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 190.08 lakh crore compared with Rs 236.45 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 slipped 272.40 points or 1.53% to settle at 17,554.30. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, surged 11.2	7% to 15.59. Adani Enterprises, ICICI Bank and Reliance Industries (RIL) were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The February 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 23 February 2023.
